title: monochromator
description: An object describing properties and set parameters of the monochromator included to the set-up used for (usually spectral) BRDF measurements. Note that the same object describes monochromators integrated to illumination or detection systems.

name.title: name
name.description: Name of the monochromator used for BRDF measurements. As a text (i.e.string).

model.title: model
model.description: Model of the monochromator used during BRDF measurements. As a text (i.e.string).

manufacturer.title: manufacturer
manufacturer.description: Manufacturer of the monochromator used during BRDF measurements. As a text (i.e.string).

type.title: type
type.description: Type of the monochromator used to select illumination or detection wavelength during BRDF measurements. For example "prism based monochromatror", "double monochromator" etc. As a text (i.e.string).

settings.title: settings
settings.description: And array with objects that describes monochromator settings for a single selected wavelength or different wavelength ranges that were used for BRDF measurements.

items.title: monochromator_setting
items.description: An object describing monochromator parameters for a single selected wavelength or wavelength range within which these parameters were constant during BRDF measurements

damage_treshold.title: damage_treshold
damage_treshold.description: Field for indication of maximum optical power at which monochromator was designed to be operated. It is an object with keys "value" and "unit".

value.title: value
value.description: Numerical value of the maximum optical power at which monochromator was designed to be operated without damage as a number.

unit.title: unit
unit.description: Unit of the maximum optical power at which monochromator was designed to be operated as a string that can have values "pW", "nW", "μW", "mW", "W", "kW", "MW" or "GW".

data_links.title: data_links
data_links.description: An object that allows to refer to available external technical information regarding monochromator used during BRDF measurements. Array of text (i.e.string) URL links.

comments.title: comments
comments.description: The section for providing any relevant information regarding monochromator used during BRDF measurements as a string/text.

adhoc_section.title: adhoc_section
adhoc_section.description: An object containing user defined keys describing any information relevant to the monochromator used for illumination or detection light wavelength selection during BRDF measurements that cannot be presented within "monochromator" object properties provided by schema. Adhoc section can contain all types of entries.
